item.description:
Movie - This Sunday, Nov. 28th at Clark University Called " Soul Kitchen", a comedy. Check out www.cinema320.com for a description of this film. Located in Worcester, MA. Also, the directions and places to park are on this website. We will meet inside on the third floor of the Jefferson Academic Center next to the theater entrance at 2:45 pm.
Come join us ! Have a laugh.
DIRECTIONS TO CINEMA 320
More Details - Below.
CINEMA 320 is located in Clark University’s Jefferson Academic Center, on the corner of Main and Downing streets in Worcester.

•Take Route 290 to the Route 9/Framingham-Ware exit in downtown Worcester.
•Turn left off exit ramp if coming from the west, turn right off ramp if coming from the east.
•Follow the signs for Route 9 West (Highland Street) through Lincoln Square.
•Take Highland about a mile.
•Turn left onto Park Avenue at Elm Park.
•Proceed up Park Avenue through the Pleasant, Chandler  and May Street intersections.
•Turn left at Downing Street (Peppercorn’s).
•Go through one stop sign.

CINEMA 320 parking is permitted in Clark Downing Street parking lot on left.  The Jefferson Academic Center is directly across Downing Street.  Use front campus entrance in the middle of the building and follow the signs.   CINEMA 320 is located on the third floor of the Jefferson Academic Center. The auditorium is elevator-accessible, via the ramped Geography Library entrance at the far end of the J.A.C. For security reasons, this door must stay locked; but unless unforeseen circumstances prevent it, Cinema 320 always has a person at the door until 5 minutes before showtime. Elevator at far end of Geography Library.

[MAP OF CLARK CAMPUS = on website]
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at Entrance of theater inside on Third floor of Jefferson Academic Center at 2:45 pm
item.name: Movie at Cinema 320 on Sunday/Clark University called "Soul Kitchen"
